ISSUE.TITLE: Currency Symbol for EUR on fresh 4.10 is wrong
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.10 Steps to reproduce the problem: NopComemrce 4.10 newly installed Go to "Configuration > Currency" Click "Edit" in the EURO line "Custom formatting" has a strange symbol like " Ђ 0.00 " instead of " € 0.00" The installed binary file is the final 4.10 from github without source Windows 2012 Datacenter US, SQL 2014 Webedition US, Core Hosting 2.1.4 ![eur](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37210350/45782892-8477df00-bc64-11e8-98c3-6d17d202058d.png)
